db:abstract.db:para: The example shows how to use QLogValueAxis.

db:section.db:title: Running the Example
db:section.db:para: To run the example from Qt Creator, open the Welcome mode and select the example from Examples. For more information, visit Building and Running an Example.

db:section.db:title: Using Logarithmic Value Axes
db:section.db:para: Create a QLineSeries instance and add some data to it.
To present the data on the chart we need a QChart instance. Add the series to it, hide the legend and set the title of the chart.
Create the axes. Add them to the chart and attach to the series.
Then create a QChartView object with QChart as a parameter. Enable antialiasing to have the rendered line look nicer.
The chart is ready to be shown.
